#summary List of api that QtWebKit is currently missing

  * Reload without cache => https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=26968; http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/45992
  * Get the original request from QWebFrame/QWebPage => https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=25867
  * Get the WebKit version => https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=27158
  * Get the QWebPage/View that an inspector is in or have an api like QWebPage `*`QWebPage::inspect(QPoint &point);
  * Emit signals:
    # when a network request is created
    # when a network request fails
    # when a network request is finished
    (including subresources like images)
  * Get a list of installed plugins => https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=27210
  * Allow to disable particular plugins
  * When there are two plugins that support the same MIME type, allow to specify which should be used.
  * Better icon database
  * A working offline storage database api
